parameters: "[outline=black]So, [b]" + GlobalVariableString(Name) + "[/b]. You think you are ready?[/outline]"
"[outline=black]Well hello, [b]" + GlobalVariableString(Name) + "[/b]! How may I help you?[/outline]"
"[outline=black]Come back to me once you have amassed a minimum of [color=FFB25D][b]4000 gold[/b][/color]![/outline]"
"[outline=black]You must trek across the swampy forest of east [b]Isla Nublar[/b] and defeat the vicious [color=D85252][b]T-Rex[/b][/color]![/outline]"
